title: KADAVAR Release New Single, "Regeneration" Off Upcoming Record, I Just Want To Be A Sound
description: Kadavar have released their third single off their upcoming record, I Just Want To Be A Sound. The post KADAVAR Release New Single, "Regeneration" Off Upcoming Record, I Just Want To Be A Sound appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Isabella Ambrosio
byline: By Isabella Ambrosio Published 5 hours ago
excerpt: Kadavar have released their third single off their upcoming record, I Just Want To Be A Sound.
text: Kadavar have released their third single, "Regeneration," off their upcoming record, I Just Want To Be A Sound, out on May 16th via Clouds Hill. Celebrating "change and new beginnings," guitarist Jascha Kreft explains, their upcoming record channels psych-rock with a modern twist. Chaotic, cathartic and melodic, Kadavar will be celebrating their release with three live shows from May 12th to May 15th. Having previously elaborated that the title track of the album is a "relentless yearning for freedom and the unshakable urge to live through music," the upcoming release should follow in the same path. You can pre-save Kadavar's upcoming record here, and check out the limited live dates below. May 13 – London, UK @ Rough Trade East May 14 – Paris, France @ SupersonicMay 17 – Berlin, Germany @ Urban Spree Want More Metal? html:
Kadavar have released their third single, "Regeneration," off their upcoming record, I Just Want To Be A Sound, out on May 16th via Clouds Hill.

Celebrating "change and new beginnings," guitarist Jascha Kreft explains, their upcoming record channels psych-rock with a modern twist. Chaotic, cathartic and melodic, Kadavar will be celebrating their release with three live shows from May 12th to May 15th.

Having previously elaborated that the title track of the album is a "relentless yearning for freedom and the unshakable urge to live through music," the upcoming release should follow in the same path.

You can pre-save Kadavar's upcoming record here, and check out the limited live dates below.

May 13 – London, UK @ Rough Trade East
May 14 – Paris, France @ Supersonic
May 17 – Berlin, Germany @ Urban Spree
